languages.text: "Мастер вокса более чем права. Вы — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, преемни{mf|к|ца} Теодоры фон Валанциус, одной из самых влиятельных женщин по эту сторону {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Зева{/g}. Но вы также — новичок в делах правления. Многие усомнятся в вашей компетентности и попытаются оторвать от протектората кусочек побольше. Необходимо показать потенциальным врагам и союзникам, что вы владеете ситуацией. Потому чем скорее мы вернем потерянные миры — тем лучше!"

traits.locale_text: "Мастер Вокса более чем права. Вы — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, преемни{mf|к|ца} Теодоры фон Валанциус, одной из самых влиятельных женщин по эту сторону {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Зева{/g}. Но вы также — новичок в делах правления. Многие усомнятся в вашей компетентности и попытаются оторвать от протектората кусочек побольше. Необходимо показать потенциальным врагам и союзникам, что вы владеете ситуацией. Потому чем скорее мы вернем потерянные миры — тем лучше!"

languages.text: "The Vox Master is entirely correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}. But you are also new to the business of governing. Many will doubt your competence and try to carve up your protectorate so they can snatch a piece for themselves. It is important to show your potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we reclaim these lost worlds, the better!"
languages.original_text: "Мастер вокса более чем права. Вы — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, преемни{mf|к|ца} Теодоры фон Валанциус, одной из самых влиятельных женщин по эту сторону {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Зева{/g}. Но вы также — новичок в делах правления. Многие усомнятся в вашей компетентности и попытаются оторвать от протектората кусочек побольше. Необходимо показать потенциальным врагам и союзникам, что вы владеете ситуацией. Потому чем скорее мы вернем потерянные миры — тем лучше!"

traits.locale_text: "The Vox Master is highly correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the Maw. But you are also new to the business of governing. Many will doubt your competence and try to carve up your empire so they can snatch a piece for themselves. It is important to show the potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we get back the lost worlds, the better!"

"The Vox Master is entirely correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the Maw. It is important to show your potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we reclaim these lost worlds, the better!"

languages.text: «La maestra de vocos está en lo cierto. Es usted {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora von Valancius, una de las mujeres más influyentes a este lado de las {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Fauces{/g}. Pero también es un{mf||a} recién llegad{mf|o|a} a esto de gobernar. Muchos pondrán en duda su competencia e intentarán dividir su protectorado para quedarse una parte. Es importante demostrar a los posibles aliados y enemigos que controla la situación. ¡Cuanto antes recuperemos los mundos perdidos, mejor!».
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master is entirely correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}. But you are also new to the business of governing. Many will doubt your competence and try to carve up your protectorate so they can snatch a piece for themselves. It is important to show your potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we reclaim these lost worlds, the better!"

traits.locale_text: «La maestra de vocos está en lo cierto. Es usted {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora von Valancius, una de las mujeres más influyentes a este lado de las {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Fauces{/g}. Pero también es un{mf||a} recién llegad{mf|o|a} a esto de gobernar. Muchos pondrán en duda su competencia e intentarán dividir su protectorado para quedarse una parte. Es importante demostrar a los posibles aliados y enemigos que controla la situación. ¡Cuanto antes recuperemos los mundos perdidos, mejor!».

languages.text: “音阵大师的话一点都没错。您是行商浪人{name}·冯-瓦兰修斯，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的继承人。尽管她是{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}巨口{/g}这一侧最有影响力的行商浪人之一，但您才刚刚开始接管这个王朝。许多人都会怀疑您的能力，他们会打算瓜分您麾下的行星，从中分一杯羹。所以，我们非常有必要让您的潜在盟友和敌人看到，您有能力掌握当前的局势。正因如此，我们必须尽快夺回这些已经失去联系的世界！”
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master is entirely correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}. But you are also new to the business of governing. Many will doubt your competence and try to carve up your protectorate so they can snatch a piece for themselves. It is important to show your potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we reclaim these lost worlds, the better!"

traits.locale_text: “音阵大师的话一点都没错。您是行商浪人{name}·冯-瓦兰修斯，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的继承人。尽管她是{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}巨口{/g}这一侧最有影响力的行商浪人之一，但您才刚刚开始接管这个王朝。许多人都会怀疑您的能力，他们会打算瓜分您麾下的行星，从中分一杯羹。所以，我们非常有必要让您的潜在盟友和敌人看到，您有能力掌握当前的局势。正因如此，我们必须尽快夺回这些已经失去联系的世界！”

languages.text: 「ヴォクスマスターがすべてにおいて正しい。陛下は自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスであられます。{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}マウ{/g}のこちら側で最も影響力のある女性のひとり、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者なのです。しかし、惑星を統治するお役目に関しては初心者でいらっしゃる。多くの人がその能力を疑い、陛下の保護領に手を出し、自分の取り分を狙っていることでしょう。将来的な味方や敵に、現在の状況にうまく対応しているのだと見せつけることが重要です。だからこそ、失った惑星を取り戻すのは早ければ早いほど良いのです！」
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master is entirely correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}. But you are also new to the business of governing. Many will doubt your competence and try to carve up your protectorate so they can snatch a piece for themselves. It is important to show your potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we reclaim these lost worlds, the better!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォクスマスターがすべてにおいて正しい。陛下は自由開拓者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスであられます。{g|Encyclopedia:Maw}マウ{/g}のこちら側で最も影響力のある女性のひとり、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者なのです。しかし、惑星を統治するお役目に関しては初心者でいらっしゃる。多くの人がその能力を疑い、陛下の保護領に手を出し、自分の取り分を狙っていることでしょう。将来的な味方や敵に、現在の状況にうまく対応しているのだと見せつけることが重要です。だからこそ、失った惑星を取り戻すのは早ければ早いほど良いのです！」

languages.text: "Die Voxmeisterin hat völlig recht. Ihr seid {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius und habt die Nachfolge von Theodora von Valancius angetreten, einer der einflussreichsten Frauen diesseits des {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Schlunds{/g}. Aber Ihr seid unerfahren im Regieren und Herrschen. Viele werden Eure Kompetenz anzweifeln und versuchen, Euer Protektorat zu zerstückeln, um selbst etwas davon zu ergattern. Es ist wichtig, dass Ihr Euren potenziellen Verbündeten und Gegnern zeigt, dass Ihr die Lage unter Kontrolle habt. Je schneller wir uns diese verlorenen Welten zurückholen, umso besser!"
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master is entirely correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}. But you are also new to the business of governing. Many will doubt your competence and try to carve up your protectorate so they can snatch a piece for themselves. It is important to show your potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we reclaim these lost worlds, the better!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Voxmeisterin hat völlig recht. Ihr seid {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius und habt die Nachfolge von Theodora von Valancius angetreten, einer der einflussreichsten Frauen diesseits des {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Schlunds{/g}. Aber Ihr seid unerfahren im Regieren und Herrschen. Viele werden Eure Kompetenz anzweifeln und versuchen, Euer Protektorat zu zerstückeln, um selbst etwas davon zu ergattern. Es ist wichtig, dass Ihr Euren potenziellen Verbündeten und Gegnern zeigt, dass Ihr die Lage unter Kontrolle habt. Je schneller wir uns diese verlorenen Welten zurückholen, ums besser!"

languages.text: « La maîtresse-vox dit vrai. Vous êtes {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|le successeur|la successeure} de Théodora von Valancius, qui était l'une des femmes les plus influentes de ce côté de la {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Gueule{/g}. Cependant, vous manquez d'expérience en tant que {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante}. Beaucoup douteront de vos compétences et tenteront de semer le trouble dans votre protectorat afin de s'en approprier une partie. Il est important de montrer à vos alliés et ennemis potentiels que vous maîtrisez la situation, c'est pourquoi nous devons rétablir le contact avec ces mondes le plus rapidement possible ! »
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master is entirely correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}. But you are also new to the business of governing. Many will doubt your competence and try to carve up your protectorate so they can snatch a piece for themselves. It is important to show your potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we reclaim these lost worlds, the better!"

traits.locale_text: « La maîtresse-vox dit vrai. Vous êtes {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|le successeur|la successeure} de Théodora von Valancius, qui était l'une des femmes les plus influentes de ce côté de la {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Gueule{/g}. Cependant, vous manquez d'expérience en tant que {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante}. Beaucoup douteront de vos compétences et tenteront de semer le trouble dans votre protectorat afin de s'en approprier une partie. Il est important de montrer à vos alliés et ennemis potentiels que vous maîtrisez la situation, c'est pourquoi nous devons rétablir le contact avec ces mondes le plus rapidement possible ! »

languages.text: "Voks üstadı bütünüyle haklı. Siz Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'sunuz, {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Ağız'ın{/g} yanındaki en nüfuzlu kadınlardan olan Theodora von Valancius'un vârisisiniz lakin aynı zamanda idare sanatında da yenisiniz. Yeterliliğinizden şüphe eden ve protektoranızdan toprak kapmak isteyen niceleri olacaktır. Potansiyel müttefiklerinize ve düşmanlarınıza her şeyin kontrolünüzde olduğunu göstermeniz mühim. Hâliyle bu yitik dünyaları ne denli hızlı geri alırsak o denli iyi olur!"
languages.original_text: "The Vox Master is entirely correct. You are Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the successor to Theodora von Valancius, one of the most influential women this side of the {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Maw{/g}. But you are also new to the business of governing. Many will doubt your competence and try to carve up your protectorate so they can snatch a piece for themselves. It is important to show your potential allies and foes that you are in control of the situation. Which is why the sooner we reclaim these lost worlds, the better!"

traits.locale_text: "Voks üstadı tamamen haklı. Siz Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'sunuz, {g|Encyclopedia:Maw}Ağız{/g}'ın bu tarafındaki en nüfuz sahibi kadınlardan biri olan Theodora von Valancius'un vârisisiniz ama aynı zamanda yönetim konusunda henüz yenisiniz. Yeterliliğinizden şüphe eden ve protektoranızı bölerek bir parçasını kendine almak isteyenler mutlaka olacaktır. Potansiyel müttefiklerinize ve düşmanlarınıza her şeyin kontrolünüzde olduğunu göstermek önemlidir. Bu nedenle de bu kayıp dünyaları ne kadar hızlı geri alırsak o kadar iyi!"
